attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To send men into the field with not even the proper batteries for thier radios is unforgiveable.Are you ashamed?
A coroner has criticised Army chiefs at the inquest into the death of a British soldier in Afghanistan.Coroner Andrew Walker said Corporal Mark Wright's death could have been avoided but for a lack of equipment and said those responsible "should hang their heads in shame".
